campus.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the land and buildings of a university or college, including the buildings where students live
campus.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a beautiful campus in New England
Most first-year students live on campus.
campus.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the land and buildings belonging to a large company
campus.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an area of land where a university has its buildings and facilities
campus.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Berkeley is the oldest of the University of California campuses.
campus.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a large area where a company has many buildings
campus.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Microsoft Corp. opened a 32-acre campus in Silicon Valley.
